item.title: "PACISE Best Undergraduate Paper Award"
item.description: Awarded best undergraduate student paper award for <a href="https://www.alexday.me/projects/emoji/">emoji translation paper</a>

item.title: "Clemson Acceptance"
item.description: Accepted into Clemson University's computer science PhD program.

item.title: Undergraduate Graduated
item.description: Graduated cum laude from Clarion University with a B.S. in computer science and a minor in chemistry.
